text: Guard or guards may refer to: * Bodyguard, someone who protects another person from assault * Lifeguard, someone who rescues people from drowning * Prison guard, someone who supervises prisoners in a prison or jail * Security guard, someone who protects property * Police in medieval contexts * Coast guard, responsible for defence of a coastline * Point guard, a position in basketball * Offensive guard, a position in American and Canadian football * Guard dog, a dog that watches for unwanted or unexpected visitors
title: Guard
